title: President Donald J. Trump is Promoting a Fiscally Responsible and Pro-American 2020 Budget – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Budget & Spending	

Issued on:
March 11, 2019
America is roaring back, and now is the time to invest in the future of America.
						President Donald J. Trump					FURTHERING OUR ECONOMIC PROSPERITY: President Donald J. Trump’s budget request will continue our economic resurgence while furthering his vision to reduce spending and invest in America.RESPONSIBLE BUDGETING: President Trump’s budget request promotes responsible Government spending by prioritizing effective programs and cutting waste.INVESTMENT IN AMERICA: President Trump’s budget request reflects his commitment to defending our Nation, ending the opioid epidemic, and building a strong American workforce.
